summary: A german translation of a great player home!!!
descriptionHtml:
[i][size=3][font=Verdana]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]VERY IMPOPTANT: Use this Mod, if you have the Dragonborn DLC [i][font=Verdana]only[/font][/i]!!![/b][/size][/color][color=#ffff00]
... many thanks to Alphawolf111 for note!!!

[b]Description:[/b]

This is my first translation I have made and want to share with you.

[b]This is not my work - I have made only the translation and repack it with TESVTranslator!!![/b]

The author [b]Feralkyn[/b] from the original Mod in english version have given me permission to release my little work here on NEXUS.

[b]You don't need the original Mod!!![/b]


[b]Important if you want to vote:

Please be so fair to give her a vote, too!!! [/b]


[b]Install Notes:[/b]
- Unrar in your main game folder
- Check whether it was activated in the skyrim launcher!!!
- That's  all and have fun!!!  ;=)


[b]Here is the link of the original great Mod:[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61040/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61040/?
[/url]

Many thanks to [b]Feralkyn[/b] for her - I think - main hard work!!!

Additional many thanks to Oblvion_Member on scharesoft.de for his great help to translate the "Letter to Lucan" part [i][size=3][font=Verdana][color=#ffff00] correctly[/color][/font][/size][/i]!!!
[/color][/font][color=#ffff00]
[/color][/size][/i]
author: Astra2000
